item.mnuOptionsEndPos: Display end p&osition of Sokoban and piece
item.lblStatusSolved: You have solved the level. Congratulations!
item.lblStatusNull: No levels currently selected. Select a level from the level list to play.
item.LevelList_Message_CannotSaveSettings: The settings could not be saved.
item.LevelList_Message_AllSolved: You have solved all levels in this level pack!
item.LevelList_Message_NoMoreUnsolved: There are no more unsolved levels in this level file.
item.LevelList_Message_NoOtherLevel: There is no other level in the level file.
item.LevelList_Message_SaveChanges: You have made changes to {0}. Would you like to save those changes?
item.LevelList_Message_DeleteLevel_CurrentlyE:
You are currently editing this level.
If you delete this level now, all your modifications will be discarded.
Are you sure you wish to do this?
item.LevelList_Message_DeleteLevel_CurrentlyP:
You are currently playing this level.
Are you sure you wish to give up?
item.LevelList_Message_DeleteLevel_Sure: Are you sure you wish to delete this level?
item.MainArea_Message_DiscardChanges: Are you sure you wish to discard your changes to the level you're editing?
item.MainArea_Message_GiveUp: Are you sure you wish to give up the current level?
item.Mainform_ChooseName: Please choose a name which will be used to identify you in highscore tables.
item.Mainform_ChooseName_FirstRun: Please choose a name which will be used to identify you in highscore tables. You can change this name later by selecting "Change player name" from the "Level" menu.
item.Mainform_ChooseName_SolvedLevel: Congratulations! You've solved the current level. Please choose a name which will be used to identify you in highscore tables. If you do not choose a name now, your score for this level will not be recorded. You can change this name again later by selecting "Change player name" from the "Level" menu.
item.Mainform_Validity_NotEnclosed: The level is invalid because it is not completely enclosed by a wall.
item.Mainform_Validity_WrongNumber: The level is invalid because the number of pieces does not match the number of targets.
item.Mainform_Validity_CannotOpen: The level could not be opened because it is invalid.
item.Mainform_Validity_CannotOpen_Fix: You must edit the level in order to address this issue. Would you like to edit the level now?
item.Mainform_Validity_CannotSave: The following problem has been detected with this level:
item.Mainform_Validity_CannotSave_Warning: You cannot play this level until you address this issue. Are you sure you wish to leave the level in this invalid state?
item.Mainform_InvalidFile: The selected file is not a valid Sokoban level file.
item.Mainform_NoHighscores: The selected level does not have any highscores associated with it yet.
item.Mainform_Error_HelpFileNotFound: The help file ({0}) could not be found.
